attributes.additional_details: To improve on democracy overall, with full public engagement, this will be the best way to improve local and national turn out in elections.
attributes.background:
requiring all eligible citizens to vote in general and local elections, while preserving the right to formally abstain on the ballot. Those who fail to participate (without a valid reason) shall incur a modest fine, ensuring civic responsibility while respecting individual choice.
Why This Matters

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Introduce compulsory voting
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706341
